name: tec-platform-production
description: TEC Learning Platform - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend && yarn install && yarn build && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && uvicorn server:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8001" "cd frontend && yarn start"
scripts.install-deps: cd frontend && yarn install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: TEC Sri Lanka
